titles: A new letter concerning the Jevves written by the French ambassador, at Constantinople, to his brother the French resident at Venice ; being a true relation of the proceedings of the Israelites, the wonderful miracles wrought by their prophet, with the terrible judgments that have fallen upon the Turks.
author: Chaumont, Alexandre, chevalier de, d. 1710.
publisher: Printed by A. Maxwell for Robert Boulter ...,
notes: Caption title, p. 1: The translation of a letter from Constantinople, written by the French Ambassador Monsieur de Cheaumont, &c.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
